backend/main.mo: Empty actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report describing two implemented features and associated files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark palettes and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component centering the ValentinePrompt on the screen.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationPhoto: Image component with eager loading and automatic retry logic before showing a fallback.
frontend/src/components/FullscreenCelebr: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/InlineCelebratio: Inline celebration view rendering floating hearts, two photos, and themed text.
Main interactive prompt with YES flow and evasive NO button logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal placeholder indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, romantic color palette, global typography, and custom utility classes/animations for the Valentine-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App with global styles.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Provides a helper to build base-path-aware URLs for static assets using Vite's BASE_URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended romantic color system, radii, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, requirements, issues, and recent changes for the romantic interactive webpage build.
